name: emi.unicore-client6
releaseNotes:
What's new



UCC was updated to use the Common Authentication Library (CANL). Note that the property file format has changed, and that the use of a property file is now mandatory. Details can be found in the UCC manual.
changeLog: Backward Incompatible: Use the EMI Common authentication library (CAnL) for credential handling, will require configuration changes
